description: {"blocks":[{"key":"85a4b","text":"This protocol study intended to describe the examination process of emotion-based study and interpersonal relationship in context of adolescent smoking. We designed a school-based smoking cessation program as a social marketing intervention tool to influence high-school student behavior using a testimonial video. We stimulate participant empathy with hypothetical scenario to observe their reaction to the stimulus. Two main independent variables in this study are salience of need and attachment style. Experimental design in this study using 2 × 2 factorial design, with one control condition. Procedures start with participants were shown a testimonial video of an adolescent suffering due to smoking, and ended by asking the participants to imagine if such consequences were happening to their own peers. Video testimony was recorded in a high-definition format (full HD 1080p/60fps) using a Sony Alpha 6000. Video editing was performed using Camtasia Studio 2019 in mp4 format. The potential implications of this research suggest that schools, as organizations, can utilize a multimedia approach (e.g., video testimonials) to design comprehensive social marketing programs focused on peer relationships.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
ethics_statement: {"blocks":[{"key":"8f4m4","text":"This research protocol was approved by Ethical Commision of Universitas Gadjah Mada, Indonesia (Ethical clearence ref. KE/UGM/037/EC/2022)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"asm9q","text":"This study consists of three main stages, namely: preparation, study implementation and post-study implementation. The study implementation guide is as follows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":50,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":20},{"style":"bold","offset":88,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"broi2","text":"All procedures must comply with standard research ethics","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d99pd","text":"School selection is carried out randomly","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rfng","text":"Participants were selected due to a random procedure, not voluntarily","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1up5n","text":"Participants receive gender-matching manipulation, due to this is an emotion-based study","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da0sr","text":"To minimize participant guess the research hypothesis, apply double blind method","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"670eb","text":"All of study activity accompanied by homeroom teacher","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2m8ul","text":"All participants and the actors are involved in this study is under 18, make sure to covered their personal identity","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv8qc","text":"Make sure the activity to do not disturb daily learning process activity, due to this study conduct in school settings","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8c5t","text":"Time management is important. Make sure all activity progressing according to the plan. Delay in the process can result on disturb daily learning process activity. Make sure to followed the research protocol to avoid activity delay","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88fme","text":"Good teamwork is important to prevent systematical error","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cimi2","text":"Study design","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buajb","text":"Decide to use control condition (variables and group control)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1llqb","text":"To minimize the possibility of alternative answer, researcher must control the participants age and sex. Control condition may imply with this situation: participants and the actors are in the same age and participant will receive study manipulation that match with their gender. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tjt8","text":"To create a benchmark and to compare to the experiment result, provide a control group. Participant in this group do not receive the experimental treatment. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7fdqd","text":"Bias mitigation plan","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t0sc","text":"Gender bias mitigation ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epp3","text":"Double-blind method","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dijnk","text":"Instrument distribution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6oh7u","text":"The pdf file distributed through class group chat (via WhatsApp group) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfgs","text":"Manipulation check","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cht4c","text":"Conduct a manipulation check to ensure there is a significant difference between level of treatment (i.e. light vs severe condition)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu7gk","text":"Significant difference between level of treatment shown the effectiveness of the treatment","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"88ehi","text":"Decide the factorial design","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu3hm","text":"The researcher decide the factorial design, in this study we use a 2 × 2 factorial design, with one control condition","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"394qb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dtm3s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":191,"id":448062,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"f6ior\",\"text\":\"Note. Each group has two versions according to gender (male and female version)\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxuab6vvx.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxt8b6vvx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxt9b6vvx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/pxt7b6vvx.webp","width":496}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4a569","text":"Determine the manipulation levels","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9lvk","text":"Conduct Focus Group Discussion (FGD)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dh9f","text":"Researcher decide what relevant information related to the manipulation development that will discussed in the discussion.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp5r7","text":"To get more accurate information about health consequence of smoking, and to conceptualize the research manipulation, we conduct FGD at Lung Hospital located in Bantul, Yogyakarta","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2l7t","text":"We collect information about (1) adolescent patients who had experienced health problems due to smoking and (2) the level of suffering.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duanh","text":"Conceptualize the level of suffering","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfu8n","text":"According to previous information, conceptualize the level of suffering in two level (light and severe suffering)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2fn4u","text":"Video testimonial design","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74unn","text":"Every video testimonial consisted of two parts. The first part was about a negative smoking consequence (salience of need), and the second consisted of the attachment style (attachment figure)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"18aj6","text":"Video testimonials Production (experimental manipulation)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"j70c","text":"School permission. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34o66","text":"To obtain a school permission is vary, due to administration procedures. Estimate it will take 4 weeks.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6p8ek","text":"The school provides permission and lists the names of students who will participate as video models ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

irrelevant messages, limit the video duration to around 1-1.30 minutes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g7e6","text":"We recommends to record the video in a high-definition format (full HD 1080p/60fps)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bucp8","text":"Convert the https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"1":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"2":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"3":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"4":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"5":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"6":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"7":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"8":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"},"9":{"data":{"guid":"E43A7E58D4CF11EE8ED40A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLS"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nl52","text":"Arrived at school and meet with the experimenter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etnb0","text":"Meet the experimenter (the homeroom teacher) and giving a brief explanation about the study","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e98qq","text":"Optional, if the study is conduct in the morning: Noted that it is very common school in Indonesia start their learning process at 06.30 AM. Please arrived before the the learning process will begun","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcg73","text":"Data compilation and preliminary analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbd8l","text":"Reminds the ten versions of data, be careful in compilation process","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3q5g5","text":"Reminds the code to help identify the group (i.e. 1=Male, 2=Female, or A, B, C, D, and E for group of treatment)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asauc","text":"Compile the data carefully in common statistical software format (i.e. SPSS)  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ekfi","text":"Handling the mortality rate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t9tq","text":"Before the study started, make sure to ask the homeroom teacher about the student (or participant) who were unable to take part in the study","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":99,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3esrp","text":"This part is important related to documenting the mortality rate and check if the random assignment works well.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":50,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bejkj","text":"In our case, 15 students could not participate in the research and they are well distributed from all groups. This means random assignment works well.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amcas","text":"Bias mitigation procedures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahq8o","text":"All the experiments were performed individually","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qtit","text":"Each participant will receive unique link, and it direct to their manipulation according to random assignment process","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39iq0","text":"Double-blind method not allowed participant to identify the kind of other treatment, even they cant identify their own treatment","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kqdm","text":"This procedures also not allowed each group interact or diffuse each other","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
